fields.name: Passives:
fields.value:
- Clarity: Whenever you empty your hand for the first time, draw 5 cards.
- Blazing: Whenever you play 3 attacking cards in a phase, draw an extra card at the end of the phase.

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Splitstrike: Pick a non-special attacking card in your hand. Triple it (without modifiers) and send all attacks toward a single player. [1 use, Unique]
- Summon: Draw 2 cards of your choice at the end of this phase. Max 1 special. [1 use, Unique]
- Thorns: Pick a room available in this Night phase. Everyone who enters that room will take 1 HP unblockable damage at the end of the phase. [2 uses, 2 CD, Post-Mortem]
